verses.name: Romans 16:18
verses.text: For they that are such serve not our Lord Jesus Christ, but their own belly; and by good words and fair speeches deceive the hearts of the simple.

verses.name: Romans 16:19
verses.text: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men. I am glad therefore on your behalf: but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good, and simple concerning evil.

verses.name: Romans 16:20
verses.text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly. The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.

verses.name: Romans 16:21
verses.text: Timotheus my workfellow, and Lucius, and Jason, and Sosipater, my kinsmen, salute you.
